long_description: The advanced-level Lange RX 130 ski boots use high performance, uniform-density plastic shells and snug footbeds for a balance between high-speed precision and a great fit you can enjoy for hours. A stiff flex offers expert skiers a responsive transfer of power from boot to ski. Uniform-density plastic shells ensure highly efficient power transfer, smooth flex and finely-tuned responsiveness, even in frigid temperatures. Shells, liners and snug, 100mm footbeds are based on a composite scan of thousands of skiers' feet for anatomic accuracy and comfort. Shells are designed to create a centered, balanced stance on rockered skis to increase efficiency of technique and reduce fatigue. Control Fit liners conform to your feet for a comfortable, high-performance fit; liners may be custom molded using a heat treatment. Specially designed insteps provide an excellent fit at the midfoot, resulting in increased circulation and greater warmth. 1-piece toe boxes and tongues eliminate seams and overlaps in the tongue-attachment area to reduce pressure points at the instep and top of the toes. Elastic 40mm power straps; rubber soles offer excellent grip.
short_description: The advanced-level Lange RX 130 ski boots use high performance, uniform-density plastic shells and snug footbeds for a balance between high-speed precision and a great fit you can enjoy for hours.
